team.name: Guillaume Broche
team.bio: Passionate gamer, sometimes even speed-runner, Guillaume worked as Associate Producer and Narrative Lead at Ubisoft on AAA titles before founding Sandfall Interactive.
team.favorites: Favorite games: Persona 3, Devil May Cry, Demon's Souls, Journey, Final Fantasy VIII

team.name: Tom Guillermin
team.bio: Tom worked as a Gameplay Programmer at Ubisoft and shipped multiple AAA games. He made multiple side-projects on his own to master the latest game tech.
team.favorites: Favorite games: World of Warcraft, Zelda Ocarina Of Time, GTA: Vice City, The Witness, Golden Sun

team.name: François Meurisse
team.bio: François worked as Project Manager and Product Manager in tech companies, after graduating in management and creative industries. At Sandfall, he handles business & production.
team.favorites: Favorite games: Disco Elysium, Celeste, Zelda Majora's Mask, Inside, Chrono Trigger

team.name: Jennifer Svedberg-Yen
team.bio: Analog astronaut, teacher, science fiction writer... You name it, Jenn has done it. She is now writing the script of Project W.
team.favorites: Favorite games: Hollow Knight, God of War, Civilization VI, Elden Ring

team.name: Nicholas Maxson-Francombe
team.bio: Illustrator and Graphic Designer, Nicholas is also well-known online for his steampunk style paintings.
team.favorites: Favorite games: Dishonored, League of Legends, The Order: 1886, Bioshock

team.name: Lorien Testard
team.bio: With love and care, Lorien composes the original music for Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
team.favorites: Favorite games: Zelda Majora's Mask, Xenoblade Chronicles, Nier Automata, Hollow Knight
